about_the_game:
Step into the world of high-end retail with Luxury Supermarket Simulator! Manage your very own luxurious supermarket, offering a vast array of products ranging from fresh fruits and vegetables to premium deli meats, seafood, snacks, and much more. Customize every detail of your store with a wide selection of furniture and decorations.

Expand your supermarket, upgrade its facilities, and hire employees. From stocking shelves with exclusive goods to designing stunning layouts, you’ll have full control over building the most elegant supermarket in city. Can you rise to the challenge and create the ultimate luxury shopping destination?
detailed_description:
Step into the world of high-end retail with Luxury Supermarket Simulator! Manage your very own luxurious supermarket, offering a vast array of products ranging from fresh fruits and vegetables to premium deli meats, seafood, snacks, and much more. Customize every detail of your store with a wide selection of furniture and decorations.

Expand your supermarket, upgrade its facilities, and hire employees. From stocking shelves with exclusive goods to designing stunning layouts, you’ll have full control over building the most elegant supermarket in city. Can you rise to the challenge and create the ultimate luxury shopping destination?
name: Luxury Supermarket Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Step into the world of high-end retail with Luxury Supermarket Simulator! Manage your very own luxurious supermarket, offering a vast array of products ranging from fresh fruits and vegetables to premium deli meats, seafood, snacks, and much more. Customize your store with furniture and decorations.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
